item.title: Shiba Inu Ecosystem Token LEASH Scores New Listing
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
Instant custody-free cryptocurrency exchange StealthEX has listed Doge Killer popularly known by its ticker LEASH, on its mobile trading app.  The exchange confirmed in a tweet that members of the SHIB Army can now access LEASH on StealthEX Mobile App. Markedly, LEASH is a unique token reserved for loyal supporters of the Shiba Inu ecosystem.

The post Shiba Inu Ecosystem Token LEASH Scores New Listing appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
Instant custody-free cryptocurrency exchange StealthEX has listed Doge Killer popularly known by its ticker LEASH, on its mobile trading app.  The exchange confirmed in a tweet that members of the SHIB Army can now access LEASH on StealthEX Mobile App. Markedly, LEASH is a unique token reserved for loyal supporters of the Shiba Inu ecosystem.

The post Shiba Inu Ecosystem Token LEASH Scores New Listing appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Breaking: Elon Musk Calls For Cancelling New York Times Over ‘Genocide Support’
item.dc:creator: Anvesh Reddy
item.description:
Tesla CEO and billionaire Elon Musk called for boycotting The New York Times over an article he alleges to be supporting genocide of white people in South Africa. Controversy erupted over the “Kill the Boer!” chant raised by Julius Malema, a South African leader during a recent rally in Johannesburg. In response, Musk had on

item.dc:creator: Anvesh Reddy
item.description:
Crypto News: MicroStrategy cofounder and hardcore Bitcoin supporter Michael Saylor said the top cryptocurrency had been gaining support universally in recent times, including from both Democrats and Republican leaders in the United States. item.title: Curve Hacker Begins Returning Stolen Funds
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
In a significant turn of events, the infamous hacker responsible for the breach of Curve Finance, a prominent Decentralized Finance (DeFi) protocol has initiated the process of returning the stolen funds.  This unexpected development marks a significant stride in the ongoing battle to enhance the security and resilience of the DeFi ecosystem. item.title: Breaking: Coinbase Files For US SEC Lawsuit Dismissal

item.description:

In its brief, the exchange argued that it does not offer investment contracts, in a way that it is not interpreted by decades of Supreme Court

item.title: Breaking: British Fintech App Revolut Stops Crypto Trading Services for US Customers
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
Amid major uncertainty in the US crypto regulatory landscape, British banking app Revolut has decided to stop offering crypto trading services to US customers starting September 2023. In an email to Decrypt on Friday, August 4, a Revolut spokesperson noted that the London-based fintech firm shall disallow US users to buy cryptocurrencies from its app,

The post Breaking: British Fintech App Revolut Stops Crypto Trading Services for US Customers appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
Amid major uncertainty in the US crypto regulatory landscape, British banking app Revolut has decided to stop offering crypto trading services to US customers starting September 2023. In an email to Decrypt on Friday, August 4, a Revolut spokesperson noted that the London-based fintech firm shall disallow US users to buy cryptocurrencies from its app,

item.title: Binance Vs SEC News: BinanceUS Files Motion In Response To Earlier Deal With SEC
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
BinanceUS, the US-based arm of the world’s largest crypto exchange Binance, has filed a motion in the court for an extension of the deadline to submit a verified financial statement. Binance and Binance.US earlier agreed with the US SEC to separate their wallets and teams, as well as share a detailed financial report with the

item.title: Breaking: Judge Jackson Cites XRP Lawsuit In Binance Vs US SEC Case
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
In the latest development in the US SEC v. Binance Holdings lawsuit, the court has announced an order to deny a motion by third-party Eeon to intervene in the lawsuit and seek counterclaim relief. The federal judge relied on Binance and US SEC’s responses opposing intervention in the enforcement action, as well other court’s decision

item.title: Will Cardano Price Below $0.3 Support lead to Extended Correction?
item.dc:creator: Brian Bollinger
item.description:
In response to the increasing bearishness of the crypto market, the Cardano price entered a correction phase after reverting from the $0.3793 mark. In the past three weeks, the memecoin tumbled 22.75% and reached the current trading price of $0.293. However, this pullback has started hinting at signs of major correction as the coin price

item.title: US SEC’s Approval Of Ethereum ETF More Likely Than Bitcoin This Year: Bloomberg
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) flooded with new Bitcoin and Ethereum exchange-traded funds (ETFs), indicating approval of multiple ETFs by the end of this year. Especially, ProShares and Bitwise are filing for various types of ETFs tracking both BTC and ETH prices, with Ethereum-related ETFs reaching 12 now. ProShares And Bitwise Files 7

The post US SEC’s Approval Of Ethereum ETF More Likely Than Bitcoin This Year: Bloomberg appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Ethereum Price Doldrums: How to Survive Second Stage Capitulation
item.dc:creator: John Isige
item.description:
Ethereum price is struggling to keep support at $1,830 intact, while the entire crypto market continues with its longstanding lull. Since the rejection from $2,000 around mid-July, recovery attempts have been minimal, with the least resistance path mainly downward. Based on the prevailing technical picture, bears have the upper hand, especially with Ethereum price below all the major

The post Ethereum Price Doldrums: How to Survive Second Stage Capitulation appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Binance Announces Shiba Inu As Collateral Asset, Shibarium’s BONE Listing Coming?
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The world’s largest crypto exchange Binance on Friday said it is adding 22 new loanable assets and new collateral assets to its Flexible Loan and VIP Loan service. The crypto exchange announces top crypto including Shiba Inu (SHIB), Compound (COMP), and Theta Network (THETA) as new collateral assets. Shiba Inu changes spark potential BONE token
